attributes.action: Make MP's involved in expenses scam, stand down and resign immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is so that those MP's do not take anymore money off the British taxpayer. All MP's that have been exposed should be the subject of criminal investigations, and prosecuted accordingly.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
